Liquidity pools
Allow users to trade EMOJI tokens on decentralized exchanges (DEX).

Ethereum main network
Enable the migration of Emoji Coins and EMOJIs to the Ethereum main network (L1). Coin owners will be able to trade on L1, while staking, burning, and other features will remain on L2.

Special edition coins
Design 2000 special edition coins, ideally through community competitions, to add an extra level of rarity and value to the collection.
